articles.author: Jeff Carlisle
articles.title: Sophia Smith: USA has lot more to give after opening WWC win - ESPN - ESPN
articles.description: USWNT forward Sophia Smith said her team's 3-0 World Cup win over Vietnam was "a good starting point" but that the Americans have "a lot more to give."
articles.content: AUCKLAND, New Zealand -- U.S. women's national team forward Sophia Smith said that her team's 3-0 win over Vietnam was "a good starting point" but that the Americans have "a lot more to give," especi… [+3574 chars]

articles.title: Science News Roundup: How El Nino is helping drive heatwaves and extreme weather; Self-healing metal? It's not just the stuff of science fiction and more - Devdiscourse
articles.description: Scientists told Reuters that climate change and El Nino are the major drivers of extreme heat that have seen temperature records broken in Beijing and Rome, while leaving some 80 million Americans under excessive heat warnings.  Self-healing metal?
